0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING NUMBER PORTABILITY FOR MOBILE TELEPHONE SERVICE
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11202 enacted on 2019-02-08 Substituted by HB07652
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02873
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING NUMBER PORTABILITY FOR MOBILE TELEPHONE SERVICE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, VICTOR A.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-11
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Belmonte (R.) (000 2018-03-06)
REMARKS: SB 1636
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2017-12-13
          -After a thorough discussion, Rep. Pineda moved, duly seconded for the creation of a Technical Working Group (TWG) to further study, consolidate and refine the measures.
      2. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2018-02-12
      3. Measure approved by the Committee on 2018-03-14
          -Thereafter, upon a duly seconded motion of Rep. Virgilio Lacson, the Substitute Bill was approved, subject to style and incorporating therein the amendments proposed by Rep. Ong.
MOTHER BILL: HB07652
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY ON 2016-08-17
